com.epimorphics.lda.core

Class EndpointMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.lda.core.EndpointMetadata

  • public class EndpointMetadata
extends Object
    Class to handle the construction of metadata for API endpoint results. Bit of a hotchpotch at the moment.
    Author:
    Chris
